languages.text: {n}Слова коменданта неожиданно перекрывает хор голосов в голове: сущность, все еще живущая в недрах вашего сознания, заходится многоголосым восторгом. Это место — это место нечто особенное для нее. В неразличимой песне вам чудятся слова о древней могиле, ныне вскрытой ради бесценного сокровища, кое было обретено верными после многовековых исканий.{/n}

{n}The warden's words are suddenly drowned out by a chorus of voices in your head: the entity that still dwells in the recesses of your mind rejoices in a cacophony of cries. This place... it holds great significance for the entity. In the frantic chanting of the voices, you can almost make out words that speak of an ancient grave, one that was opened, for it contained a priceless treasure, a most coveted prize that was retrieved by the faithful after a centuries-long search.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова коменданта неожиданно перекрывает хор голосов в голове: сущность, все еще живущая в недрах вашего сознания, заходится многоголосым восторгом. languages.text: {n}你脑中无数声音突然异口同声爆发出来，淹没了典狱长的话语。在这一片嘈杂的叫声中，你思想深处的意识感到雀跃不已。这个地方……对那个意识而言有着重要的意义。在那混乱的声音之中，你隐约听到这是一座古老的坟墓。而如今，这座坟墓被人打开，里面那件令无数人垂涎的宝物被带走了。经过几个世纪的寻找，这件宝物终于被虔诚之人找回来了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warden's words are suddenly drowned out by a chorus of voices in your head: the entity that still dwells in the recesses of your mind rejoices in a cacophony of cries. This place... it holds great significance for the entity. In the frantic chanting of the voices, you can almost make out words that speak of an ancient grave, one that was opened, for it contained a priceless treasure, a most coveted prize that was retrieved by the faithful after a centuries-long search.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你脑中无数声音突然异口同声爆发出来，淹没了典狱长的话语。在这一片嘈杂的叫声中，你思想深处的意识感到雀跃不已。这个地方……对那个意识而言有着重要的意义。在那混乱的声音之中，你隐约听到这是一座古老的坟墓。而如今，这座坟墓被人打开，里面那件令无数人垂涎的宝物被带走了。经过几个世纪的寻找，这件宝物终于被虔诚之人找回来了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un chœur de voix vous envahit soudainement l'esprit, noyant la réponse du directeur dans une cacophonie de cris enjoués. Ce lieu... Il semble avoir une importance capitale pour l'entité qui réside dans votre esprit. Dans tout ce brouhaha, vous parvenez à discerner quelques mots ; les voix parlent d'une ancienne tombe recelant un trésor inestimable, tombe qui aurait été ouverte par des fidèles après des siècles de recherches.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warden's words are suddenly drowned out by a chorus of voices in your head: the entity that still dwells in the recesses of your mind rejoices in a cacophony of cries. This place... it holds great significance for the entity. In the frantic chanting of the voices, you can almost make out words that speak of an ancient grave, one that was opened, for it contained a priceless treasure, a most coveted prize that was retrieved by the faithful after a centuries-long search.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un chœur de voix vous envahit soudainement l'esprit, noyant la réponse du directeur dans une cacophonie de cris enjoués. Ce lieu... Il semble avoir une importance capitale pour l'entité qui réside dans votre esprit. Dans tout ce brouhaha, vous parvenez à discerner quelques mots ; les voix parlent d'une ancienne tombe recelant un trésor inestimable, tombe qui aurait été ouverte par des fidèles après des siècles de recherches.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un coro de voces en tu mente ahoga las palabras del alcaide: la criatura que aún habita en los rincones de tu mente se regocija en una cacofonía gritona. Este lugar... es importante para la criatura. En el frenético coro de voces, casi distingues palabras que hablan de una tumba antigua que ha sido abierta porque contenía un tesoro incalculable, un premio codiciado recuperado por los fieles tras siglos de búsqueda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warden's words are suddenly drowned out by a chorus of voices in your head: the entity that still dwells in the recesses of your mind rejoices in a cacophony of cries. This place... it holds great significance for the entity. In the frantic chanting of the voices, you can almost make out words that speak of an ancient grave, one that was opened, for it contained a priceless treasure, a most coveted prize that was retrieved by the faithful after a centuries-long search.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un coro de voces en tu mente ahoga las palabras del alcaide: la criatura que aún habita en los rincones de tu mente se regocija en una cacofonía gritona. Este lugar... es importante para la criatura. En el frenético coro de voces, casi distingues palabras que hablan de una tumba antigua que ha sido abierta porque contenía un tesoro incalculable, un premio codiciado recuperado por los fieles tras siglos de búsqueda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}所長の言葉が突然、あなたの頭の中に響く声の合唱によってかき消された。心の奥底に棲んでいる存在が、喜んで不協和音を叫んでいる。この場所はその存在にとって、大きな意味を持つ。必死に詠唱する声の中に、開けられた古代の墓について語る言葉が聞こえてくる。その墓には、何世紀にもわたる捜索の末、信者たちの手に入った、貴重な宝があった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warden's words are suddenly drowned out by a chorus of voices in your head: the entity that still dwells in the recesses of your mind rejoices in a cacophony of cries. This place... it holds great significance for the entity. In the frantic chanting of the voices, you can almost make out words that speak of an ancient grave, one that was opened, for it contained a priceless treasure, a most coveted prize that was retrieved by the faithful after a centuries-long search.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所長の言葉が突然、あなたの頭の中に響く声の合唱により、かき消された。心の奥底に棲んでいる物体が、喜んで不協和音を叫んでいる。この場所は…物体にとって、何か重要な意味がある。そうだ、頭の中に大量の声の中には、古代の墓について語るものがある。その墓には貴重な宝があり、何世紀にもわたる捜索の末、信者たちによって開けられていた。{/n}
{n}所長の言葉が突然、あなたの頭の中に響く声の合唱によってかき消された。心の奥底に棲んでいる存在が、喜んで不協和音を叫んでいる。この場所はその存在にとって、大きな意味を持つ。必死に詠唱する声の中に、開けられた古代の墓について語る言葉が聞こえてくる。その墓には、何世紀にもわたる捜索の末、信者たちの手に入った、貴重な宝があった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Worte des Hüters werden plötzlich von einem Chor von Stimmen in deinem Kopf übertönt: Das Wesen, das noch immer in den hintersten Winkeln deines Verstands haust, jubiliert in einer Kakophonie von Rufen. Dieser Ort ... ist für das Wesen von großer Bedeutung. Du kannst in dem ausgelassenen Stimmengewirr fast Worte ausmachen, die von einem uralten Grab sprechen. Einem Grab, das geöffnet wurde, weil es einen großen Schatz enthielt, der nach jahrhundertelanger Suche von den Gläubigen geborgen wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warden's words are suddenly drowned out by a chorus of voices in your head: the entity that still dwells in the recesses of your mind rejoices in a cacophony of cries. This place... it holds great significance for the entity. In the frantic chanting of the voices, you can almost make out words that speak of an ancient grave, one that was opened, for it contained a priceless treasure, a most coveted prize that was retrieved by the faithful after a centuries-long search.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Worte des Hüters werden plötzlich von einem Chor von Stimmen in deinem Kopf übertönt: Das Wesen, das noch immer in den hintersten Winkeln deines Verstands haust, jubiliert in einer Kakophonie von Rufen. Dieser Ort ... ist für das Wesen von großer Bedeutung. Du kannst in dem ausgelassenen Stimmengewirr fast Worte ausmachen, die von einem uralten Grab sprechen. Einem Grab, das geöffnet wurde, weil es einen großen Schatz enthielt, der nach jahrhundertelanger Suche von den Gläubigen geborgen wurde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Müdürün sözleri bir anda kafana doluşan bir ses korosu tarafından bastırılıyor. Zihninin kuytularında kendine yer edinmiş o varlık, bir çığlık kakofonisiyle sevinçlere boğuluyor. Bu mekân... Varlık için büyük önem arz ediyor. Durmaksızın konuşan sesler arasında kadim bir kabrin bahsinin geçtiğini duyar gibi oluyorsun. Yüzyıllarca süren bir arayışın sonunda nihayet imanlıların eline geçen o herkesin arzuladığı ödülü, o paha biçilemez hazineyi barındırdığı için açılan bir kabirden bahsediyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warden's words are suddenly drowned out by a chorus of voices in your head: the entity that still dwells in the recesses of your mind rejoices in a cacophony of cries. This place... it holds great significance for the entity. In the frantic chanting of the voices, you can almost make out words that speak of an ancient grave, one that was opened, for it contained a priceless treasure, a most coveted prize that was retrieved by the faithful after a centuries-long search.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Müdürün sözleri bir anda kafana doluşan bir ses korosu tarafından bastırılıyor. Zihninin kuytularında kendine yer edinmiş o varlık, bir çığlık kakofonisiyle sevinçlere boğuluyor. Bu mekân... Varlık için büyük önem arz ediyor. Durmaksızın konuşan sesler arasında kadim bir mezarın bahsinin geçtiğini duyar gibi oluyorsun. Yüzyıllarca süren bir arayışın sonunda nihayet imanlıların eline geçen o herkesin arzuladığı ödülü, o paha biçilemez hazineyi barındırdığı için açılan bir mezardan bahsediyorlar.{/n}
